resources.string: Press on color below to apply

• Founder 
• Core Developer 
• UI/UX Designer
• Maintainer
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Show the network traffic indicator arrows
Enables reboot option in power menu
Enables the advanced reboot menu for rebooting options
Enables screenshot option in power menu
Enables screenrecord option in power menu
Enables flashlight option in power menu
Enables Airplane mode option in power menu
Enable the ability to show and use the power menu dialog while on the lockscreen
Show the reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the advanced reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the screenshot option on the lockscreen
Show the screenrecord option on the lockscreen
Show the airplane mode option on the lockscreen
Only valid if button navigation mode is used.
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor in %1$s after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Display the 4G or LTE network icon when available in the statusbar
Double tap to sleep on lock screen
Double tap anywhere on the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Screen overlay showing current CPU info
Unlock device with biometric after reboot without PIN/Password/Pattern\nNote: at your own risk!
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
Display the tile edit icon in quick settings footer
Display Settings icon in quick settings footer
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Control the blur amount of media artwork
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Jump to camera gesture is now disabled
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Show text in expanded qs footer
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Customize screenshot attributes like time, delay,type etc
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Haptic feedback on action instead on press
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Controls whether the navigation bar is displayed
Customize clock and date in statusbar
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Hide and show clock at regular intervals of time
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Enable with battery saver to increase power savings
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Always display battery percentage when charging
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Show heads up only for dialer app and disable all others
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Show quick settings on secure lockscreen
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Actions executed when the screen is turned off
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off
Force apps that support expanded notifications
Customize the clock widget on the lockscreen
Customize the date, weather, alarms and zen on the lockscreen
Show auto-brightness icon to the right of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Show + - brightness control buttons near the slider
Allow legacy apps to use full screen
Applications need to be restarted after changes
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Listen for fingerprint when pocket detection is active
Play sound and vibration for notifications when screen is on
Display an animation when the device is plugged in
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup notifications except calls & alarms
Block all headsup notifications except alarms
Block all headsup notifications except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Block notifications sound & vibration when Gaming mode is turned on
Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Pulse Battery light in Do Not Disturb mode
Pulse Notif. LED on low battery
Set brightness to use when notifcations are shown
Set brightness to use during ambient display on
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Keep showing on always on display. Until the screen is turned on
Hide other AoD content when bars are showing
Pulses for any doze wake and not just notifications when enabled
Repeat edge lighting animation on doze wake
Display Running Services icon in quick settings footer
Display Multi-user switcher icon in quick settings footer
Display VoLTE icon when available in the statusbar
Display the visualizer bars on ambient display
Pulse flash when there\'s a call waiting
Hide the lock icon on lockscreen
Configure notification light on per-app basis
Use a custom image for QS header
Select an image from pre-installed image collections
Select an image from internal storage
Set QS background color from Wallpaper
Disable custom QS styles for external theme engines
Shift navbar and statusbar icons to prevent burn-in
Force apps to ignore notch space
Whether to show R style notification headers (Requires a SystemUI restart)
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Customize gestures and set custom actions
To choose a specific app activity for the action, long press on any app in the app picker.\n\nIf launcher is showing, do the swipe at the very bottom area of the screen to trigger the action.
Trigger action if the swipe is horizontally wider than 3\/4 of display size
Select an app to launch with the squeeze action
